title: Jon Simmons from Balance and Composure
itunes:title: Jon Simmons from Balance and Composure
description:
In a very special episode I sat down with Jon Simmons, vocalist/guitarist for Balance and Composure, for a chat. We spoke about spirituality, old guy music for young people and finding balance (pardon the pun). 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
